description:
GitHub has announced a new feature that enables developers to extend Copilot with third-party skills, providing an extra layer of customisation. At this year’s Build conference, it announced the acquisition of a conversational assistant tool company called Semantic Machines to help enhance its products. GitHub’s “AI pair programming tool,” Copilot, also grabbed significant attention with the... Read more »

The post GitHub Copilot gains extensions as GitHub and FileZilla face malware exploits appeared first on Developer Tech
title: GitHub Copilot gains extensions as GitHub and FileZilla face malware exploits
